definition: the Three Rules of Discipline and Eight Points for Attention, a military doctrine issued in 1928 by Mao Zedong for the Red Army, which included a number of injunctions demanding high standards of behavior and respect for civilians during wartime
pinyin: San1 Da4 Ji4 lu:4 Ba1 Xiang4 Zhu4 yi4

definition: Disciplinary Committee of Chinese Communist Party
pinyin: Zhong1 Gong4 Zhong1 yang1 Ji4 lu:4 Jian3 cha2 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
containing_words.word: 中共中央紀律檢查委員會

definition: Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the CCP
pinyin: Ji4 lu:4 Jian3 cha2 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

sentences.english: Human Factors is the discipline of optimising human performance in the workplace.
sentences.chinese: 人的因素，是優化人在工作場所的表現紀律。

sentences.english: Let your focus be on guiding your children to develop actual discipline.
sentences.chinese: 讓你的重點落在指導孩子形成真正的紀律自制上來。

sentences.english: The discipline of legionaries is absolute.
sentences.chinese: 紀律保證了軍團士兵的絕對服從。

sentences.english: This is a common strategy among pros who have a lot of experience and iron discipline.
sentences.chinese: 這是有經驗，有鐵的紀律的專業人士常用的策略。

sentences.english: Instead of punishing a child for violating a school policy, they battle the policy.
sentences.chinese: 不因爲觸犯了學校的紀律懲罰孩子，而是攻擊校規。

sentences.english: The competent authorities shall impose necessary administrative and disciplinary sanctions on those who have violated the aforesaid provisions.
sentences.chinese: 違反者，主管部門應給予必要的行政或紀律處分。

sentences.english: I am a well-disciplined, highly-motivated person with a strong desire to succeed.
sentences.chinese: 我紀律性強，積極進取，有強烈的成功願望。

sentences.english: ABS believes discipline is as important as talent in its managers.
sentences.chinese: ABS相信，經理人的紀律和才能同樣重要。

sentences.english: Second, a disproportional rate of male and female students in one class is conducive to class discipline and learning effect.
sentences.chinese: 其次，男女比例不一致有利於班級紀律和學習成效。

sentences.english: Is a worker terminated or disciplined who is not willing to work in overtimes ?
sentences.chinese: 不願加班的工人是否會被解僱或紀律處罰？

sentences.english: The other reason lies on some businessmen's short of occupational disciplines.
sentences.chinese: 另一個原因在於有些生意人缺乏職業紀律。

sentences.english: Welcome students to participate in the door, but to abide by the disciplinary activities.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎茼學冂參伽，但崾遵守萿動紀律。

sentences.english: Heighening the audit work is the need of upholding the discipline of finance and economics.
sentences.chinese: 加強審計工作是維護財經紀律的需要。

sentences.english: Any member of the Macao Garrison who breaches military discipline shall be subject to disciplinary sanction.
sentences.chinese: 澳門駐軍人員違反軍隊紀律的，給予紀律處分。

sentences.english: Any member of the Macao Garrison who breaches military discipline shall be subject to disciplinary sanction.
sentences.chinese: 澳門駐軍人員違反軍隊紀律的，給予紀律處分。

definition: norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
to hold accountable/to blame/to censure/to apportion blame
